transactions.description: Financial transactions with support for splits. Use is_parent/is_child/parent_id to identify split transactions.

accounts.description: Bank accounts, credit cards, and other financial accounts. Use offbudget to filter tracking vs budget accounts.

categories.description: Transaction categories for budgeting. Linked to category_groups via the group field.

category_groups.description: Groups that organize categories. Use is_income to identify income vs expense groups.

payees.description: Payee/merchant information. transfer_acct links to the account for transfer payees.

schedules.description: Recurring transaction schedules. Fields starting with _ are derived from the linked rule.

rules.description: Transaction rules with conditions and actions for auto-categorization.

notes.description: General notes storage keyed by id.

preferences.description: User preferences stored as key-value pairs.

reflect_budgets.description: Budget data for reflect budgeting method.

zero_budgets.description: Budget data for zero-based budgeting method.

dashboard_pages.description: Dashboard page definitions for organizing widgets.

dashboard.description: Dashboard widget configurations with position and size.

$eq.description: Equals. Handles null comparison correctly (IS NULL).

$ne.description: Not equals. Handles null correctly (IS NOT NULL).

$oneof.description: In array (membership test). Values are deduplicated.

$like.description: Case-insensitive fuzzy string match with Unicode normalization.

$sum.description: Sum of values. Use in select with groupBy.

$substr.description: Extract substring from a string field.

$id.description: Identity function, returns the value unchanged.

$literal.description: Force literal value interpretation (prevent field reference).
